channel.title: Hosters, today is your lucky day!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://www.tobiasscape.fusiveweb.co.uk/Portals/26904/TOBIAS!!!!!!!!!!make%20me%20a%20staff%20plz!!!.bmp[/img] Yup, you read right. You have a chance to host a world on TobiasScape, for more info, click [url=http://www.tobiasscape.com/play/page.html]here[/url] but you don't really have to because i've quoted it all below incase people think im advertising!
Interested in hosting a server for us? Please add support.tobias9@hotmail.com to your MSN contacts, or email me at the same address. Job Info: You can choose the update day, you will be given admin in game, the IP must be tobiasscape[world_number].no-ip.org, you will get a free open-source copy of my server, you may get your picture on the banner depending on the quality of your service and, you must be able to host a no-ip server at least 10/5, I can check.
Ok, basically all im saying there is theese are the requirements+terms: [ul][li]You choose the update day[/li] [li]you will be given/offered admin in game[/li] [li]The IP must be tobiasscape[world_number].no-ip.org[/li] [li]You will get a free open-source copy of my server[/li] [li]You may get your picture on the banner depending on the quality of your service[/li] [li]You must be able to host a no-ip server at least 10/5, I can check[/li][/ul] As for the lagg state, I don't mind as long as it's not too bad with 60 people playing, the better it is, the more people will play it and the better your service becomes. On the 30th of march, 2008, TobiasScape's world one had over 350 people playing within an hour of it being released. [img]http://www.tobiasscape.fusiveweb.co.uk/Portals/26904/players.bmp[/img] Yeah, so if you're interested, add me: support.tobias9@hotmail.com , PM me or email me. Have a poke around the site first if you want: [url=http://www.tobiasscape.com]here[/url]. [img]http://www.tobiasscape.fusiveweb.co.uk/Portals/26904/tobiasscapev4.jpg[/img] Tobias[/center]

item.title: Hosters, today is your lucky day!
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

you said it was my lucky day! i thought i was gonna get something LUCKY!!!! I HATE YOO!!!!!!!!
Are you a hoster?
lol when are you going to realase it? may i leech it?
I dont know, No you may not leech it.

Read full topic

item.title: Hosters, today is your lucky day!
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

Umm, no you havent. Mabye in the server status. I haven’t released yet.
And give me a link dont just tell us you think you’ve seen it before.
And theese are not role-playing forums as far as I know, I don’t want to know if you’ve coughed all over my topic.

NO LINK = NO PROOF = NO ARGUMENT, FUCK OFF.

Read full topic

item.title: Hosters, today is your lucky day!
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

[center]

Yup, you read right.
You have a chance to host a world on TobiasScape,
for more info, click here
but you don’t really have to because i’ve quoted it all below incase people think im advertising!

Interested in hosting a server for us? Please add support.tobias9@hotmail.com to your MSN contacts, or email me at the same address. Job Info: You can choose the update day, you will be given admin in game, the IP must be tobiasscape[world_number].no-ip.org, you will get a free open-source copy of my server, you may get your picture on the banner depending on the quality of your service and, you must be able to host a no-ip server at least 10/5, I can check.

Ok, basically all im saying there is theese are the requirements+terms:

[ul][li]You choose the update day[/li]
[li]you will be given/offered admin in game[/li]
[li]The IP must be
tobiasscape[world_number].no-ip.org[/li]
[li]You will get a free open-source copy of my server[/li]
[li]You may get your picture on the banner depending on the quality of your service[/li]
[li]You must be able to host a no-ip server at least 10/5, I can check[/li][/ul]

As for the lagg state, I don’t mind as long as it’s not too bad with 60 people playing, the better it is, the more people will play it and the better your service becomes.

On the 30th of march, 2008, TobiasScape’s world one had over 350 people playing within an hour of it being released.

Yeah, so if you’re interested, add me: support.tobias9@hotmail.com , PM me or email me.
Have a poke around the site first if you want: here.

Tobias[/center]

Read full topic
